title: World’s Second-Largest Container Carrier Sees Global Trade Slowing — Julianne Geiger
description:
And A.P. Moller-Maersk A/S—which controls one-sixth of the world’s container trade—sees global trade slowing between 2% and 4% in a stark warning for not just the container industry but the oil and gas industry as well.…
Oilprice
World’s Second-Largest Container Carrier Sees Global Trade Slowing
Julianne Geiger
author: contrarianmedia@hotmail.com (Mike Norman)
